item.description:
I've just returned home from an excellent presentation on Agile Transformations by Chris Beale at Agile New England, which was somewhat focused on top-down tranformations in large companies.

In this meeting, I'd be interested in discussing tactics for bottom-up transformations in small companies, as that's what I'm currently trying to do.Â  I suspect it's more difficult.
item.how_to_find_us: Try to recognize me from the meetup photo. This photo and some of other members are also at http://xtcboston.blogspot.com/
item.name: eXtreme Tuesday Club - Boston Monthly Meetup
